title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Bills Over Rams Reaction, 'Sharp or Square' Week 1 NFL Picks
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Bills Over Rams Reaction, 'Sharp or Square' Week 1 NFL Picks
description:
Colin reacts to the Bills throttling the Rams in the 2022 NFL opener (3:00), then (10:00) "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on if Jets QB Zach Wilson is already a bust, what Baker Mayfield’s trash talking t-shirts say about him, if Dabo Swinney’s new deal leaves him underpaid, and if the Cowboys are massively overrated.

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 1 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Packers/Vikings (22:00), Eagles/Lions (24:00), Colts/Texans (25:00), Niners/Bears (29:00), Jags/Commanders (31:00), Browns/Panthers (33:00), Chiefs/Cardinals (35:00), and which NFL starting QB Colin will never, ever bet on (ever) (38:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
